General.Name: Guangdong Enpack Packaging Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Enpack Packaging Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of metal packaging products in China. It offers peel off lid, dried food, canned food, beverage, and daily chemicals easy open end products, as well as bottom end and combo EOE products. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shantou, China.
General.Address: Middle Section of Danan Road, Shantou, China

2.Name: Ms. Pei Qiao  Qiu
2.Title: Chairman of Supervisory Board and Human Resource Department Mang.
